name: Drone Hero
description: Feel like the world's best drone pilot! Designed for VR but also supports a regular screen with keyboard/gamepad.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: CPU Intel i5-4590 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
